comment.author: 65930410@N05
comment._content: Cousin Nate Luffman ( Nathan Charles Luffman) is son of Robert Donavon Luffman & Clarissa Masters.  He was born 12 August 1876 in Deseronto.  This is also a cousin to Adam Henry Luffman listed in the Deseronto Obit archives who drowned while skating iat Great Bend in North Fred with cousin Nathan (pic above) & uncle Thomas in 1895.
